question: In each of the following pairs of compounds, decide which possesses the indicated property to the greater degree. (a) Length of $\ce{Câ€“X}$ bond: acetyl fluoride or acetyl chloride. (b) Acidity of the boldface H: $\ce{CH_2(COCH_3)_2}$ or $\ce{CH_2(COOCH_3)_2}$. (c) Reactivity toward addition of a nucleophile: (i) an amide or (ii) an imide (as shown in the margin). (d) High-energy infrared carbonyl stretching frequency: ethyl acetate or ethenyl acetate.
